name: media-render
title: Media Render
oneLiner: Smart media renderer with NSFW and follows-based content filtering
documentation:
The Media Render component provides intelligent media filtering for Nostr events. It automatically blurs content that contains NIP-36 content-warning tags or comes from users you don't follow, with a click-to-reveal interface.

## Features

- **NSFW Content Detection**: Automatically detects and blurs content with `content-warning` tags (NIP-36)
- **Follows-based Filtering**: Blurs media from users you don't follow (when logged in)
- **Click-to-Reveal**: Simple interaction to show blurred content
- **Global Configuration**: Control NSFW blocking via ContentRenderer
- **Media Type Support**: Handles images, videos, and YouTube embeds
